name: Ext_R5_Practitioner_co_language
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Practitioner.communication.language for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Practitioner.communication.language from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Practitioner|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The language code used to communicate with the practitioner
element.definition: The ISO-639-1 alpha 2 code in lower case for the language, optionally followed by a hyphen and the ISO-3166-1 alpha 2 code for the region in upper case; e.g. "en" for English, or "en-US" for American English versus "en-AU" for Australian English.
element.comment: `Practitioner.communication.language` has no related element in R4B:Practitioner

element.short: The language code used to communicate with the practitioner
element.definition: The ISO-639-1 alpha 2 code in lower case for the language, optionally followed by a hyphen and the ISO-3166-1 alpha 2 code for the region in upper case; e.g. "en" for English, or "en-US" for American English versus "en-AU" for Australian English.
element.comment: `Practitioner.communication.language` has no related element in R4B:Practitioner

binding.description: IETF language tag for a human language
